---
name: publishAgents
description: Publish custom agents to VS Code prompts directories.
argument-hint: Comma-separated list of agent names to publish
---
Publish the custom agents {agent names} to VS Code Stable and VS Code Insiders user prompts directories. Use the publish script with the -Force flag to overwrite existing files if necessary. Verify the publication by checking the timestamps and file sizes in both directories match the workspace versions.
